attributes.action: Give all NHS & Front Line workers an extra month of paid annual leave.
attributes.additional_details: Front line / Key workers are currently battling to save lives during the Covid-19 pandemic, risking their own lives to do so. Some have had to leave their homes and haven't seen their children / families in weeks. I believe that these workers deserve the opportunity to claw back some of the time they have missed out on with their families during this pandemic which is why I am asking the government to consider offering an extra month of paid leave to those working for the NHS and front line.
attributes.background: I believe that Parliament / the government should support businesses / management committees with financial means to facilitate giving front line / key worker staff an extra month of paid annual leave following the Covid-19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
The NHS are responsible for decisions about annual leave, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We've published several petitions about rewards and recognition for NHS staff which you may wish to sign:
